name: Mooshie's Kitchen 2
storyline: n Mooshie's Kitchen 2, you play as Todd once again. After escaping Mooshie's, Todd is approached by the FBI and the US government to go back to Mooshie's Kitchen on a top-secret black operations mission to stop Mooshie once and for all! If Todd succeeds, he'll be given tax-exempt status and will never have to pay taxes in his life again!
summary: Welcome back to Mooshie's Kitchen! Things have changed since you were last here...
